Review: Great spot to stop for a margarita on a rare, scorching hot and muggy afternoon in St. John's. Service was very friendly and efficient, the outdoor street-side patio was fun, and the margaritas - both the blueberry and the spicy mango - hit the spot. 5 stars.
Great sandwiches, tons of flavour, drinks are great too
Hands down the best place for Turkey pie and fries dressing and gravy
Delicious food, beautiful family-business staff, and very reasonably priced. Amazing selection of vegan and gluten free options - would highly recommend!
